We create a List to store the names retrieved from the cursor. We iterate over the cursor using a while loop and retrieve the "NAME" value for each row. We add each name to the namesList.

Finally, we convert the namesList to an array using the toArray method and store it in the namesArray variable. The namesArray will contain the names corresponding to the specified id.
